info: T means true, F means False. If no publications, just leave the publication structure unchanged.
name: Daniel A. Lass

publications.text: Daniel Lass, L. Joe Moffitt, Nikolaos Zirogiannis and Catherine Neal. “Stochastic Efficiency Analysis of Alternative Systems for Producing Landscape Trees in the Northeast.” (In preparation.)

Valluri, Swetha, Sheila Mammen, Daniel Lass. “Factors that Determine the Health Care Use of Low Income, Rural Mothers and Children: Policy Implications Based on a Simultaneous Choice Model.”  (In preparation.)
